name: The 13th Hour
description:
Game Made during the 2020 Halloween Game Jam of the Game Design Club of the SAE Institute of Geneva.

The theme of the Jam was "13"

Controls: WASD = Movements E = Inventory Ctrl = Croutch Space = Interaction and use stairs

To use your inventory items, you have to click them in the inventory

Credits:

Game Programming: 

Luca Floreau
Sébastien Feser
Sandy Woolman

Arts:
